'''Radiant Spincrystal 140''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Dazzling Moon of Metztli]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located by the band playing music in the [["People of the Springs"]] subarea.
